```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
# Load the data
all <- read.csv("resp_improve.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")

# Filter out participants we can't use
filtered <- filter(all, wfh != "", wfh != "not_working")

# Isolate the relevant information
df <- data.frame(
  wfh = filtered$wfh,
  duration_focus_pre = filtered$duration_focus_pre,
  duration_focus_post = filtered$duration_focus_post_2
)
df
```
